title: Market analysis
content: We validate demand, pricing, and absorption in the target area, and review zoning, utilities, and site risks. The outcome is a clear go/no-go with a preliminary schedule and cost window.

title: Financing & loan management
content: We assemble the lender package, secure terms with regional banks, and coordinate appraisal and closing. During the build, we manage draw schedules, inspections, and compliance so funds flow on time.
alt: Image representing financing and loan management

title: Architectural project
content: We develop the design aligned to the panelized steel system—walls, roof, and floor—defining service paths, openings, and connection details. You receive permit-ready plans, panel schedules, and a crane/assembly plan.

title: Modular construction (3-4 months)
content: Panels are fabricated with Florida partners, labeled for traceability, and delivered to site for a repeatable assembly sequence: layout → first lift → lock & align → close-in. Quality checks are documented at each stage until punchlist close-out.

title: Pre-sale & exclusive sales
content: With Tsalach Real Estate, we set the go-to-market plan—positioning, pricing, and launch calendar—then manage leads, reservations, and closings. Buyers get clear documentation and timelines from the first contact to handover.
alt: Image representing pre-sale and exclusive sales
